title: #050 - Elevate Your Workspace with Desha Peacock
itunes:title: #050 - Elevate Your Workspace with Desha Peacock
description: It is easy to let papers pile up on your desk, and it is even easier to justify why cleaning them up is a task for tomorrow. If you could elevate your mood by moving the papers, would you? Desha Peacock, coach, award-winning host and TV producer, and two-time author, shares tips and tricks on how to upgrade our workspaces.
